original_text: But the man would not tarry that night, but he rose up and departed, and came over against Jebus, which is Jerusalem; and there were with him two asses saddled, his concubine also was with him.
korean_text: 그 사람이 다시 밤을 지내고자 하지 아니하여 일어나서 떠나 여부스 맞은편에 이르렀으니 여부스는 곧 예루살렘이라 안장 지운 나귀 두 마리와 첩이 그와 함께 하였더라

sentences.original_text: But the man would not tarry that night
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 사람은 그 밤에 머물지 않았고

sentences.original_text: but he rose up and departed
and there were with him two asses saddled
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 안장을 얹은 나귀 두 마리가 있었고

sentences.original_text: his concubine also was with him
